Creator Justin Haythe

Abdel-Rahym Madi( Servant (Pope)1 episode, 2022 ). Stefo Linard( Soldier1 episode, 2022 ). Rémy Adriaens( Footman #31 episode, 2022 ). Jordan Bigot( Charles IX1 episode, 2022 ). Matthieu Lionnard( Rahima’s Guard1 episode, 2022 ). James Clack( Royal Page1 episode, 2022 ). Ludovic Coutaud( Royal Guard (uncredited)2 episodes, 2022 ). Guillemette Buffet( Madeleine de la Tour (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). Olivier Sa( Spanish soldier (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 ). David Clark( Royal Guard (uncredited)1 episode, 2022 )

Language English

Producers Nick O’Hagan. Stacie Passon. Brad Rohrer. Willa Whalen. John Bernard. Ariella Blejer. Jessica Brickman. Ashley Cardiff. Elizabeth Chakkappan. Justin Haythe. Dawn Kamoche. Francis Lawrence. Cameron MacConomy. Erwin Stoff

Production 3 Arts Entertainment. Attitude Production. Lionsgate Television.

Certificate 15+

Official sites Official Facebook Official Instagram

Season 1

Total Episodes 5
